contents: , this is a good place to gather resources and make your first temporary home. However, it is

to build a permanent base here! Players could randomly teleport there and find it easily due to its proximity to spawn.


When you are ready, try moving out at least a few tens of thousands of blocks (utilising Nether highways) so that you, your builds, and your items can be safer.
